languages.text: "Вы займете пост маршала Простора. Каких перемен стоит ждать после вашего вступления в должность?"
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne is to become the new Marshal.

traits.locale_text: "Вы займете пост маршала Простора. Каких перемен стоит ждать после вашего вступления в должность?"

languages.text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne is to become the new Marshal.
languages.original_text: "Вы займете пост маршала Простора. Каких перемен стоит ждать после вашего вступления в должность?"

traits.locale_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
"So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
"So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
"So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
"So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
"So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

languages.text: 「それで、あなたがコロヌス・エクスパンスの将帥の座に就くんだね。就任後、我々はどのような変化が起こると予想すればいいんだ？」
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、あなたがコロヌス・エクスパンスの将帥の座に就くんだね。就任後、我々はどのような変化が起こると予想すればいいんだ？」

languages.text: "Ihr übernehmt also den Posten des Marschalls der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Welche Änderungen dürfen wir nach Eurem Amtsantritt erwarten?"
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr übernehmt also den Posten des Marschalls der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Welche Änderungen dürfen wir nach Eurem Amtsantritt erwarten?"

languages.text: « C'est donc vous qui allez assumer le rôle de maréchal des Étendues de Koronus. À quels changements faut-il s'attendre une fois que vous aurez pris vos fonctions ? »
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est donc vous qui allez assumer le rôle de maréchal des Étendues de Koronus. À quels changements faut-il s'attendre une fois que vous aurez pris vos fonctions ? »

languages.text: «Se dispone a asumir el cargo de mariscal de la Extensión de Koronus. ¿Qué cambios cabe esperar cuando ocupe su puesto?».
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: «Se dispone a asumir el cargo de mariscal de la Extensión de Koronus. ¿Qué cambios cabe esperar cuando ocupe su puesto?».

languages.text: “也就是说，你将会担任科罗努斯扩区的元帅一职。你上任之后，会为法务部带来哪些变化？”
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你将会担任科罗努斯扩区的元帅一职。你上任之后，会为法务部带来哪些变化？”

languages.text: "Demek Koronus Enginliği Miralayı artık sen olacaksın... Göreve geldikten sonra neleri değiştirmeyi düşünüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"

traits.locale_text: "Demek Koronus Enginliği'nin yeni Miralay'ı olacaksın... Göreve geldikten sonra neleri değiştirmeyi düşünüyorsun?"

languages.original_text: "So, you are going to assume the position of Marshal of the Koronus Expanse. What changes should we expect after you enter office?"
